equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>7.5</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Flickerstep
base_affixes: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by <text class='c_random'>4.32</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
base_affixes: After you spend <text class='c_number'>450</text> of your Primary Resource, your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill is guaranteed to <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text>. Your Critical Strikes that <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> deal <text class='c_random'>144.11%</text> increased damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Helm
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>43.49%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.43%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>86.08%</text>.

equipment.name: Tibault's Will
base_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>50.65%</text> increased damage while <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> and for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds after. When you become <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, gain <text class='c_number'>70</text> of your Primary Resource.

equipment.name: Lidless Wall
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> While you have an active <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text>, hitting an enemy outside of a <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> has up to a <text class='c_random'>36.94%</text> chance to spawn an additional <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increase the chance by <text class='c_number'>37.5%</text> and the total additional <text class='c_important'>Bone Storms</text> you can have by <text class='c_number'>1.5</text>.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Restore +20.25% Primary Resource

equipment.name: Twin-blade
strikethrough_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>46.31%</text> increased Shadow damage to enemies afflicted by both <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> and <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text>.
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>34.71%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Loop
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>66.52%</text> of normal damage.
+19.6% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: +11.25% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>69.03%</text> of normal damage.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +19.55% Chance to Slow
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.64%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>49.28%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.
